title: Pbe
body: So I was recently accepted to the Alpha Client. I was wondering what my chances are to be accepted into PBE now?

replies.body: PBE and Alpha tests are independent programs, so getting into one won't necessarily change your chances for the other.  We can't expedite PBE applications, and I don't have any information on how to get accepted beyond what's provided in the [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  Best of luck with your application!
